botinfo.name: your bots name
botinfo.testServer: the id of the testing server

webhooks.starts: webhook link to get start messages to

API.google: google api key this is for the Perspective API for automod, read https://developers.perspectiveapi.com/s/docs-get-started for details.

spotify.clientId: spotify client id from spotify developers dashboard
spotify.clientSecret: spotify client secret from spotify developers dashboard

music._nodesComment: for the nodes below, dont change anything unless you know how to work lavalink. this is a free lavalink server off of google that can be used for the bot. you may delete this once acknowledged
